devdoc.author: Joel Reis
devdoc.details: `AutoDeFi` requires ERC20 tokens to function, instances of this are created      for local blockchains to properly display token information / balances.

params._owner: The address of the account owning tokens
params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

returns.remaining: Amount of remaining tokens allowed to spent

params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens
params._value: The amount of wei to be approved for transfer

returns.success: Whether the approval was successful or not

balanceOf(address).details: necessary to know how many specific tokens an ETH address has

params._owner: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

params._decimalUnits: The amount of decimals that this token will use
params._tokenName: The name that will be associated with this token
params._tokenSymbol: The symbol that will be associated with this token

params._value: The amount of token to be transferred

returns.success: Whether the transfer was successful or not

params._value: The amount of token to be transferred

returns.success: Whether the transfer was successful or not

allowed.details: This tracks the spending permissions of any adddress that has ever had or given spending permissions
allowed.return: The spend allowance of a specific address pair

balances.details: This tracks the balance of any adddress that has ever had tokens
balances.return: The balance of a specific address

name.details: The name for the given token
name.return: memory The name of the ERC20 token

symbol.details: Then symbol for the given token (e.g. `USDC`)
symbol.return: memory The of the ERC20 symbol

totalSupply.details: The current token supply. Can be modified
totalSupply.return: The total amount of tokens currently available
